A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Deepest Star Wars movie since The Empire Strikes Back. I hear a lot of people saying things like \"The force doesn't work like that\"!!!! and/or \"Disney has ruined Star Wars\" This movie took chances....it expanded the lore. After watching A New Hope we didn't know the Force could move and pick up objects. Empire Strikes back made the Force a super power. Return of the Jedi added Force lightening. The prequels added super speed and super jumps. The Last Jedi expanded the lore and I really don't see anything wrong with that.
